attributes.action: Ban ticket touts, who make the lives of music fans an expensive misery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Example: This morning at 9am, Police tickets went on sale on-line and were sold out in minutes. This afternoon i searched one of the auction sites for "Police tickets" and found 1190 entries. Clearly these are not real fans who have found themselves unable to attend the concert, they are the lowest form of pond-life TOUTS. This practice hugely inflates the price of tickets to the real fans, plus the louts who blockade the venues before the concert make the whole process a very unpleasant one. Why is this allowed to happen? The government needs to work with the ticket agencies and venues, and also make the selling of tickets, either in the street or electronically totally illegal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
